a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global number affected by natural disasters, 1900 to 2022
Global total number of people affected by natural disasters. This is defined as the sum of the injured, affected and
those left homeless after a disaster.
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Université catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
